methods.description: Places a multiple or a complex bet.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: A unique identifier of your application that is generated by the API portal.

parameters.name: apiSecret
parameters.description: Another unique identifier for your application.

parameters.name: apiTicket
parameters.description: The ticket obtained from the sessions API

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Specify an absolute field list to return (Comma Separated List)

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Specify fields in addition to the default to return (Comma Separated List)

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Specify fields from the default to exclude (Comma Separated List)

parameters.description: Another unique identifier for your application.

parameters.name: apiTicket
parameters.description: The ticket obtained from the sessions API

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Specify an absolute field list to return (Comma Separated List)

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Specify fields in addition to the default to return (Comma Separated List)

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Specify fields from the default to exclude (Comma Separated List)

methods.description: Organises the betslip when one or more selections are made. It returns a bet slip structure organised by betting opportunities.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: A unique identifier of your application that is generated by the API portal.

parameters.name: apiSecret
parameters.description: Another unique identifier for your application.

parameters.name: expanded
parameters.description: Allows for all bets for given selections to be returned - not just the specified type

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: A unique identifier of your application that is generated by the API portal.

parameters.name: apiSecret
parameters.description: Another unique identifier for your application.

parameters.name: apiTicket
parameters.description: The ticket obtained from the sessions API

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Specify an absolute field list to return (Comma Separated List)

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Specify fields in addition to the default to return (Comma Separated List)

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Specify fields from the default to exclude (Comma Separated List)

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: A unique identifier of your application that is generated by the API portal.

parameters.name: apiSecret
parameters.description: Another unique identifier for your application.

parameters.name: apiTicket
parameters.description: The ticket obtained from the sessions API

parameters.name: dateFrom
parameters.description: The UTC FROM datetime from bets to be returned. (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss)

parameters.name: dateTo
parameters.description: The UTC TO datetime for bets to be returned. (yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss)

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Specify an absolute field list to return (Comma Separated List)

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Specify fields in addition to the default to return (Comma Separated List)

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Specify fields from the default to exclude (Comma Separated List)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The index of the page to return

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of results per page

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The order the response will be retuned by. i.e. transDateTime,desc. Only transDateTime can be used currently

parameters.name: settled
parameters.description: Filter by settled bets. If omitted, both settled and unsettled will be returned.

methods.description: Allows a trusted application to cash in a bet (take a return on a bet) on behalf of the customer

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: A unique identifier of your application that is generated by the API portal.

parameters.name: apiSecret
parameters.description: Another unique identifier for your application.

parameters.name: apiTicket
parameters.description: The ticket obtained from the sessions API

parameters.name: betId
parameters.description: The identifier of the bet

parameters.name: cashInValue
parameters.description: The cash in value of the bet

parameters.name: cashinBetDelayId
parameters.description: The ID of this bet delay

apiDescription:
The Bets API methods are used to place single, multiple and complex bets and to retrieve a customer’s bet history. When retrieving a customer’s bet history you can organize the bets from the betting history in terms of date, bet type and whether the bet is settled or not. You can also specify what fields to be included/excluded or return a list of all default fields the method returns.

The Bets API will also generate a bet delay if you’re placing a single/multiple bet in-Play by creating a time margin to negate the effects of major changes to the market (for example, goals during a football match). Note that in version 2 of our APIs, Bets API contains the functionality of both Bets API v1 and the Betslips API v1.
